metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25650 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the way the spice-vdagentd daemon handled filetransfers from the host system to the virtual machine. Any unprivilegedlocal guest user with access to the UNIX domain socket path`/run/spice-vdagentd/spice-vdagent-sock` could use this flaw to perform amemory denial of service for spice-vdagentd or even other processes in theVM system. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to systemavailability. This flaw affects spice-vdagent versions 0.20 and previousversions.

criterions.comment: spice-vdagent: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
